author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Conduit Capital Posts Headline Earnings Of R53.3 Million ‍For HY 2017
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Conduit Capital Ltd:
* ‍FOR HY 2017, HEADLINE EARNINGS WERE R53.3 MILLION, COMPARED TO RESTATED LOSS OF R34.4 MILLION FOR SIX MONTHS ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2016​
* ‍HY NET ASSET VALUE PER SHARE INCREASED TO 188.5 CENTS, WHICH TRANSLATES INTO AN ANNUALISED 14.1% IMPROVEMENT​
* ‍AT 31 DECEMBER 2017, GROUP’S TOTAL EQUITY WAS R1.35 BILLION COMPARED TO R527 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
